abstract: Barclays Capital has named Joe Gatto as its chairman of investment banking for the Americas, according to an internal memorandum obtained by DealBook.
snippet: Barclays Capital has named Joe Gatto as its chairman of investment banking for the Americas, according to an internal memorandum obtained by DealBook.
lead_paragraph: Barclays Capital  has named Joseph D. Gatto as its chairman of investment banking for the Americas, according to an internal memorandum obtained by DealBook.

headline.main: Barclays Capital Names Gatto to I-Banking Post

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
